parameters: \n<\N[1]>No easy way to get her attention from down here.\.\.
Going to have to get onto her desk.
\n<\N[1]>That's... Going to be quite a climb.
\n<\N[1]>Maybe I can climb up to her bag,
and then onto her desk from there.\.\. I'll be
able to avoid the potential hazard of her feet that way.
\n<\N[10]>\fiSigh...\fi\.\. That's enough of this for now.
\n<\N[1]>Shit!\.\. I got knocked into her bag...
\n<\N[1]>What the hell did I land on?
\n<\N[1]>It's sticky as hell...\.\. I can't move...
from the lollipop. If I tried I could probably
\n<\N[10]>(Hmm, some of the lollipop broke off already?)
Ushered to the back of \N[10]'s throat in a wave of
slips straight into her esophagus with no resistance
You're helpless against the crushing throat muscles, and pumped down into the depths of her body,
where you plunge directly into the depths of \N[10]'s freshly-eaten lunch.\!
An unprotected scrap of meat in the endless depths of gastric
acid. It doesn't take long before you fall prey to her speedy metabolism.
\n<\N[1]>\N[10]... can you please get me off this thing?
\n<\N[10]>Can you explain all this to me?\.\.
Why are you as small as a piece of candy?\.\.
Why were you attached to my lollipop?!
\n<\N[1]>Well... As you might have guessed, this is another
one of \N[3]'s wild experiments gone pretty wrong.\.\.
I was supposed to be grown back to normal by now but that
crazy girl from my class decided to smash up \N[3]'s lab at the worst time.
I was trying to make it up to you
\n<\N[1]>I climbed onto your desk to get your attention...
\n<\N[1]>But then you kind of knocked me into your
I was trying to make it up to you
\n<\N[1]>I know I haven't been able to spend as much time
with you lately.\.\. So I thought you might enjoy having me as
\n<\N[10]>HUH?\.\. You wanted to make up for not hanging out
with me by becoming my CANDY?
\n<\N[1]>I know you have a sweet tooth.\.\.
It all turned out ok in the end didn't it?
\n<\N[10]>You know I still haven't gotten a
\n<\N[1]>Um, \N[10], aren't you salivating a bit too much?
\n<\N[1]>You're not actually planning to eat me are you?
\n<\N[10]>Why don't you come on in and find out yourself?
\N[10] sucks on you with a fervour you've never seen
her from her. Tossed around her soft maw, you feel like a scrap of
chicken having every ounce of flavour drained from your body.
Cherry-flavoured saliva sloshes and pools so deeply there's
barely even room for you to breathe. Your body, clothes, and every
fiber of your being feel bogged down by the deluge of \N[10]'s cravings.
She never opens her mouth the entire time,
her fruity but stagnant breath your only oxygen within the
Finally the oral assault ends.\.\. You're blinded by the
canine-silhouetted daylight that pours over you
\n<\N[10]>Jeez \N[1], you can't tempt me like this.\.\.
I was about \fithis\fi close to swallowing.\.\. You're giving a
whole new meaning to “cute enough to eat.”
\n<\N[1]>Haha don't worry \N[10].\.\. I think I may have enjoyed
that even more than you did.
\n<\N[10]>Alright \N[1], I'll take you to the staff office.\.\.
They'll know what to do to help you!
\n<\N[1]>I just know that \N[3] is going to be in deep shit
if they find out about this.\.\. I want to give her a chance
\n<\N[1]>Besides, I don't even know if the faculty would be
able to help me out.\.\. Worst case scenario is I become some
kind of specimen being experimented on in a lab somewhere.
\n<\N[10]>Oh...\.\. That is a possibility I hadn't
\n<\N[10]>In that case, what can I do to help you?
\n<\N[1]>I've been trying to get a hold of \N[3].\.\.
I saw her go into my classroom.
\n<\N[1]>But uhh...\.\. I can't get past the door.
to hold the door open for you?
\n<\N[10]>No worries, I will help you out.\.\. Let's get going!
Would you be able to help me look for her?
\N[10] helps you search the school for some time...
\n<\N[10]>Oh, Hiro! You're back!\.\. What can I do for you?
\n<\N[1]>I just saw \N[3] go into my classroom!
\n<\N[10]>That's great!\.\. So um... What are you doing here?
to hold the door open for you?
\n<\N[10]>No worries, I will help you out.\.\. Let's get going!
with anything at all, or you just want someone to
protect and take care of you, come straight to me!
\n<\N[1]>I'll keep that in mind. Thank you \N[10].
\n<Female Student>Well we'd better get back to our class,
\n<\N[1]>But on the bright side, \N[10] is here.\.\.
I can't think of anyone more trustworthy to get help from.
